feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.3°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -31.2°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. A few local snow squalls early this morning. Blowing snow early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
